questions.ques: In order for a source code file, containing the public class Test, to successfully compile, which of the following must be true?

options.a: It must have a package statement
options.d: It must declare a public class named Test

questions.ques:
What output is displayed as the result of executing the following statement?
System.out.println("// Looks like a comment.");

options.b: The statement results in a compilation error

NullPointerException,
ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException,
ArithmeticException,
NumberFormatException 

are seen in _______

options.c: public synchronized void writeTo(OutputStream out) throws IOException
